name: Assassin's Creed III: The Tyranny of King Washington - The Betrayal
name_original: Assassin's Creed III: The Tyranny of King Washington - The Betrayal
description:
Assassin's Creed III: The Tyranny of King Washington - The Betrayal is an action game developed by Ubisoft Quebec. It came out on 20-03-2013. It was published by Ubisoft Entertainment. On review aggregator Metacritic, Assassin's Creed III: The Tyranny of King Washington - The Betrayal has a score of 66. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Assassin's Creed III: The Tyranny of King Washington - The Betrayal on Xbox 360, PlayStation 3 and PC. You can purchase the game on Steam.
